ageProblem.question: John, who is twelve years old, is three times as old as his brother. How old will John be when he is twice as old as his brother?

numberSeriesNext.question: What number comes next in the series: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ...?

sequenceNext.question: What comes next in the sequence: O, T, T, F, F, S, S,...?

logicalDeduction.question: If some books are red and all red things fade over time, which of the following must be true?

options.text: All red books fade over time.

comparativeCost.question: Blueberries cost more than strawberries. Strawberries cost less than raspberries. If the first two statements are true, which is the cheapest fruit?

ipAssignmentProtocol.question: Which protocol is used to assign IP addresses to devices on a network automatically?

directoryViewCommand.question: In Linux, which command is used to view the contents of a directory?

volatileMemoryComponent.question: Which of the following components is considered volatile memory, meaning it loses its contents when the power is turned off?

hierarchicalDataStructure.question: Which of the following data structures is best suited for storing hierarchical data, like a file system?

webPageFetchProtocol.question: Which protocol is used primarily to fetch web pages on the internet?
